name: Make It Transparent!
description:
A story about a game where the developer forgets to enable transparency for all the sprites!

Make It Transparent is a story based rpg+shooter game. It was made for the BlackthornProd Game Jam #1.  

Just Play and enjoy the game :)

Controls : 

-Use WASD or Arrows Btn to Move

-Use mouse to shoot

-Press F to Toggle Fulscreen

Makers : Bonyok77 (Developer), Violentia RC (Designer)

used assets : Teddy Bear Waltz music from Incompetech
